EmailTemplate.name: NY DBA Queens County Partnership
EmailTemplate.subject: NY DBA Queens County Partnership
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for choosing LegalZoom for your DBA order. Please follow the steps listed below to complete your order.
Next steps: • Do not make any changes to the attached document as it will result in delays with your order. If you need to make changes, please contact our Customer Support. • Print two (2) copies of the document on white paper using black ink. Please do not use color ink. • In the presence of a Notary Public, please have all listed partners sign their names in black ink on all copies where indicated. The documents must then be properly notarized. • There are 2 different sections for Notary Acknowledgement. Only 1 is to be completed. If the documents are being Notarized in the state of New York, please only have the Section identified as "Acknowledgement in New York State" completed, located on 1st page of the application. If the documents are being notarized outside the state of New York, please only have the Section identified as "Acknowledgement Outside New York State" completed, located on 2nd page of the application. • Secondarily, it is important that the Notary Public apply their stamp/seal below their signature line. • Mail the documents to our address listed below. Please include a form of identification for all listed registrant(s). This identification need not be a photo ID, but it must clearly represent the name of any listed registrant and their corresponding residence address. Examples of acceptable identification would be a copy of a utility bill or a driver?s license. Please note that we cannot accept faxes of the DBA application as the County office will only accept original signed documents.
LegalZoom.com, Inc. 101 N. Brand Blvd., 10th Floor POB 29096 Glendale, CA 91209-9096 Attn: Business Filings (Order #XXXXXXX)
If you have any questions regarding your order, please contact our {!snippetVariable.cc_dept_full} at {!snippetVariable.ccphone} or customercare@legalzoom.com. Please include your order number in your correspondences for prompt service.
{!snippetVariable.ccsincerely}
{!snippetVariable.cclegalzoomline} {!snippetVariable.cc_dept_full} {!snippetVariable.ccphone} | {!snippetVariable.lz_address} {!snippetVariable.lz_website}
This is a service email related to your LegalZoom account. For more information about how LegalZoom uses your information, please see the Privacy Policy: http://www.legalzoom.com/privacy-policy-popup.html
LegalZoom provides access to independent attorneys and self-help services at your specific direction. We are not a law firm or a substitute for an attorney or law firm. Prices, features, terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. LegalZoom is located at 9900 Spectrum Drive, Austin, TX 78717.
Please add services@emails.legalzoom.com to your address book.
This email was sent to: {!Contact.Email}
